summary.span: 實作區分文化特性 (Culture) 的字串比較的一組方法。

span.span: Implements a set of methods for culture-sensitive string comparisons.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 比較和排序資料的慣例而異的文化。Conventions for comparing and sorting data vary from culture to culture. 例如，排序次序可能會根據語音或字元的視覺表示法。For example, sort order may be based on phonetics or on the visual representation of characters. 在東亞語言中，字元是依照筆劃和表意字元的巨大。In East Asian languages, characters are sorted by the stroke and radical of ideographs. 排序也取決於順序語言和文化特性使用的字母。Sorting also depends on the order languages and cultures use for the alphabet. 例如，丹麥文的 "Æ" 字元在字母順序中排列在 "Z" 之後。For example, the Danish language has an "Æ" character that it sorts after "Z" in the alphabet. 此外，比較可能會區分大小寫或區分大小寫，而且大小寫規則可能也會因文化特性。In addition, comparisons may be case-sensitive or case-insensitive, and casing rules may also differ by culture. 類別是負責維護此區分文化特性字串比較資料，以及執行區分文化特性的字串作業。The class is responsible for maintaining this culture-sensitive string comparison data and for performing culture-sensitive string operations. 一般而言，您就不必具現化直接物件，因為其中一個正以隱含方式由所有的非序數字串比較作業，包括呼叫方法。Typically, you do not have to instantiate a object directly, because one is used implicitly by all non-ordinal string comparison operations, including calls to the method. 不過，如果您想要擷取物件，您可以執行下列其中一種方式：However, if you do want to retrieve a object, you can do it in one of these ways: - 所擷取的值特定文化特性的屬性。By retrieving the value of the property for a particular culture. - 藉由呼叫靜態與文化特性名稱的方法。By calling the static method with a culture name. 這允許晚期繫結存取物件。This allows for late-bound access to a object. ## 忽略搜尋值Ignored search values 字元集包含可忽略的字元，這些字元在執行語言或區分文化特性的比較時不列入考慮。Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive comparison. 比較方法，如和執行區分文化特性比較時不考慮這類字元。Comparison methods such as and do not consider such characters when they perform a culture-sensitive comparison. 可忽略的字元包括：Ignorable characters include: - .. 區分文化特性的比較方法一定會找到空字串 （索引以零為） 的開頭要搜尋的字串。Culture-sensitive comparison methods will always find an empty string at the beginning (index zero) of the string being searched. - 字元或字碼指標比較選項，尤其是，由於不視為在作業中的字元所組成的字串和選項會產生哪些符號與非空格組合中的搜尋字元會被忽略。A character or string consisting of characters with code points that are not considered in the operation because of comparison options, In particular, the and options produce searches in which symbols and nonspacing combining characters are ignored. - 字串，具有沒有語言意義的字碼指標。A string with code points that have no linguistic significance. 例如，區分文化特性字串比較一律會忽略選擇性連字號 (U + 00AD)。For example, a soft hyphen (U+00AD) is always ignored in a culture-sensitive string comparison. ## 安全性考量Security considerations 如果安全性決策是根據字串比較或大小寫的變更而定，您應該使用屬性，以確保行為一致，不論作業系統的文化特性設定為何。If a security decision depends on a string comparison or a case change, you should use the property to ensure that the behavior is consistent, regardless of the culture settings of the operating system. > [!NOTE] > 如果可能的話，您應該使用具有型別參數的字串比較方法指定的預期的比較類型。When possible, you should use string comparison methods that have a parameter of type to specify the kind of comparison expected. 一般而言，用於比較使用者介面中顯示的字串 （使用目前文化特性） 的語言選項，並指定或安全性比較。As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify or for security comparisons. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何相關聯的物件物件會影響字串比較。The following example shows how the object associated with a object affects string comparison. [!code-cpp[CompareInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompareInfo/cpp/CompareInfo.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CompareInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompareInfo/CS/CompareInfo.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CompareInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompareInfo/VB/CompareInfo.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 行為取決於它的實作，可能會從一個版本的 common language runtime 到另一個，或從一個.NET Framework 平台變更到另一個。The behavior of is dependent on its implementation, which might change from one version of the common language runtime to another, or from one .NET Framework platform to another. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果兩個字串物件是否相等，方法會傳回相同的值。If two string objects are equal, the method returns identical values. 不過，沒有每個唯一的字串值的唯一雜湊程式碼值。However, there is not a unique hash code value for each unique string value. 不同的字串可能會傳回相同的雜湊碼。Different strings can return the same hash code. > > 不保證雜湊程式碼本身是穩定的。The hash code itself is not guaranteed to be stable. .NET Framework 的版本和跨平台 （例如 32 位元和 64 位元） 的單一版本的.NET framework，相同字串的雜湊程式碼可能會不同。Hash codes for identical strings can differ across versions of the .NET Framework and across platforms (such as 32-bit and 64-bit) for a single version of the .NET Framework. 在某些情況下，它們甚至可以與應用程式定義域。In some cases, they can even differ by application domain. > > 如此一來，雜湊程式碼應該永遠不會使用外部應用程式定義域中他們所建立，它們應該永遠不會當做索引鍵的欄位，在集合中，使用，以及它們應該永遠不會保存。As a result, hash codes should never be used outside of the application domain in which they were created, they should never be used as key fields in a collection, and they should never be persisted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會搜尋字串的結尾從字串開頭的來源字串。This method searches the source string from the beginning of the string to the end of the string. 這個多載會執行區分文化特性的搜尋。This overload performs a culture-sensitive search. 如果`value`表示預先組成的 Unicode 字元，例如連音符號"Æ 」 (U + 00 C 6)，它可能會被視為等同於出現在正確的順序，例如"AE"及其元件的任何 (u+0041，U + 0045)，這取決於文化特性。If `value` represents a precomposed Unicode character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), it might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of its components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. 若要執行的序數 （不區分文化特性） 搜尋，其中的字元會被視為等於另一個字元只在其 Unicode 字碼指標相同，您應該呼叫多載，具有參數的型別並用值。To perform an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where a character is considered equivalent to another character only if their Unicode code points are the same, you should call an overload that has a parameter of type and use the value. 不同於，會執行區分文化特性的比較結果的多載搜尋的字元都執行序數比較，然後搜尋字串的多載執行區分文化特性比較的方法。Unlike , which performs a culture-sensitive comparison, overloads of the method that search for a character perform an ordinal comparison and overloads that search for a string perform a culture-sensitive comparison. > [!NOTE] > 如果可能的話，您應該使用具有型別參數的字串比較方法指定的預期的比較類型。When possible, you should use string comparison methods that have a parameter of type to specify the kind of comparison expected. 一般而言，用於比較使用者介面中顯示的字串 （使用目前文化特性） 的語言選項，並指定或安全性比較。As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify or for security comparisons. ## Examples 下列範例會判斷字元或字串內子字串的第一個和最後一個項目的索引。The following example determines the indexes of the first and last occurrences of a character or a substring within a string. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf/CPP/indexof.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf/CS/indexof.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf/VB/indexof.vb#1)]

returns.span: 如果有找到，則是在 的區段 (從 延伸至 結尾) 內， 第一次出現的以零起始的索引，否則為 -1。

span.span: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of , if found, within the section of that extends from to the end of ; otherwise, -1.

returns.span: 如果 一個可忽略的字元，則傳回 。

span.span: Returns if is an ignorable character.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在來源字串中搜尋開始向前`startIndex`並在字串結尾結束。The source string is searched forward starting at `startIndex` and ending at the end of the string. 這個多載會執行區分文化特性的搜尋。This overload performs a culture-sensitive search. 如果字元是 Unicode 值，表示預先組成的字元，例如連音符號"Æ 」 (U + 00 C 6)，它可能要視為相當於正確的順序，例如"AE"及其元件的任何項目 (u+0041，U + 0045)，這取決於文化特性。If the character is a Unicode value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), it might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of its components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. 若要執行序數 （不區分文化特性） 搜尋，其中字元視為相當於另一個字元的 Unicode 值都相同時，才，您應該呼叫其中一個參數類型多載並用值。To perform an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where a character is considered equivalent to another character only if the Unicode values are the same, you should call one of the overloads that has a parameter of type and use the value. 多載字元該搜尋會執行序數搜尋，而其會搜尋字串執行區分文化特性的搜尋。Overloads of that search for a character perform an ordinal search, whereas those that search for a string perform a culture-sensitive search. > [!NOTE] > 如果可能的話，您應該呼叫字串比較方法具有一個型別的參數指定的預期的比較類型。When possible, you should call string comparison methods that have a parameter of type to specify the kind of comparison expected. 一般而言，用於比較使用者介面中顯示的字串 （使用目前文化特性） 的語言選項，並指定或安全性比較。As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify or for security comparisons. ## Examples 下列範例會判斷字元或字串的一部分內子字串的第一個和最後一個項目的索引。The following example determines the indexes of the first and last occurrences of a character or a substring within a portion of a string. 請注意，並要搜尋的字串，即使使用相同的不同部分`startIndex`參數。Note that and are searching in different portions of the string, even with the same `startIndex` parameter. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOfInt#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOfInt/CPP/indexofint.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOfInt#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOfInt/CS/indexofint.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOfInt#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOfInt/VB/indexofint.vb#1)]

para.span: 字元集包含可忽略的字元，也就是執行語言或文化特性的排序時不會考慮的字元。

span.span: Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive sort.

para.span: 在區分文化特性的搜尋中，如果是可忽略的字元，結果就相當於搜尋已移除該字元。

span.span: In a culture-sensitive search, if is an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed.

para.span: 在此情況下，方法一律會傳回，這是搜尋開始處的字元位置。

span.span: In this case, the method always returns , which is the character position at which the search begins.

para.span: 在下列範例中，方法用來在兩個字串中，尋找"n"之後的選擇性連字號 (U + 00AD)。

span.span: In the following example, the method is used to find a soft hyphen (U+00AD) after an "n" in two strings.

para.span: 只有其中一個字串包含選擇性連字號。

span.span: Only one of the strings contains a soft hyphen.

para.span: 在這兩種情況下，因為選擇性連字號是可忽略的字元，則方法會傳回 1，表示它已找到相符項目位置的"n"。

span.span: In both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the method returns 1 to indicate that it has found a match at the position of the "n".

Unicode 值，表示為預先的字元，例如連音符號"Æ 」 (U + 00 C 6)，可能會被視為相等於任何出現在正確的順序，例如"AE"字元的元件 (u+0041，U + 0045)，這取決於文化特性。A Unicode value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of the character's components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. 如果`options`包含值，這個多載會執行序數 （不區分文化特性） 搜尋，其中比較的 Unicode 值。If `options` includes the value, this overload performs an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where the Unicode values are compared. > [!NOTE] > 如果可能的話，您應該呼叫字串比較方法具有一個型別的參數指定的預期的比較類型。When possible, you should call string comparison methods that have a parameter of type to specify the kind of comparison expected. 一般而言，用於比較使用者介面中顯示的字串 （使用目前文化特性） 的語言選項，並指定或安全性比較。As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify or for security comparisons. ## Examples 下列範例會判斷字元或字串內子字串的第一個和最後一個項目的索引。The following example determines the indexes of the first and last occurrences of a character or a substring within a string. is .

para.span: 字元集包含可忽略的字元，也就是執行語言或文化特性的排序時不會考慮的字元。

span.span: Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive sort.

para.span: 執行區分文化特性的搜尋 (也就是說，如果 不是 或 ) 時，如果 包含可忽略的字元，則結果等於在已移除該字元的情況下搜尋。

span.span: In a culture-sensitive search (that is, if is not or ), if contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed.

para.span: 如果只包含一個或多個可忽略的字元，方法一律會傳回 0 （零），以指出找到相符項目時，會在開頭。

span.span: If consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the method always returns 0 (zero) to indicate that the match is found at the beginning of .

para.span: 在下列範例中，方法用來尋找兩個字串中的三個的子字串 （選擇性連字號 (U + 00AD)，後面接著"n"，選擇性連字號和選擇性的連字號後面接著"m"）。

span.span: In the following example, the method is used to find three substrings (a soft hyphen (U+00AD), a soft hyphen followed by "n", and a soft hyphen followed by "m") in two strings.

para.span: 只有其中一個字串包含選擇性連字號。

span.span: Only one of the strings contains a soft hyphen.

para.span: 因為選擇性連字號是可忽略的字元，區分文化特性的搜尋會傳回相同的值，它會傳回選擇性連字號所不包含搜尋字串中。

span.span: Because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, a culture-sensitive search returns the same value that it would return if the soft hyphen were not included in the search string.

para.span: 序數搜尋，不過，成功於一個字串中找到選擇性連字號，並報告它不存在從第二個字串。

span.span: An ordinal search, however, successfully finds the soft hyphen in one string and reports that it is absent from the second string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在來源字串中搜尋開始向前`startIndex`並在字串結尾結束。The source string is searched forward starting at `startIndex` and ending at the end of the string. 值無效，此方法。The value is not valid for this method. 如果`options`不包含值，這個多載會執行區分文化特性的搜尋。If `options` does not include the value, this overload performs a culture-sensitive search. 如果字元是 Unicode 值，表示預先組成的字元，例如連音符號"Æ 」 (U + 00 C 6)，它可能要視為相當於正確的順序，例如"AE"及其元件的任何項目 (u+0041，U + 0045)，這取決於文化特性。If the character is a Unicode value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), it might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of its components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. 如果`options`包含值，這個多載執行序數 （不區分文化特性） 搜尋。If `options` includes the value, this overload performs an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search. 字元會被視為相等於另一個字元的 Unicode 值都相同時，才。A character is considered equivalent to another character only if the Unicode values are the same. 多載字元該搜尋會執行序數搜尋，而其會搜尋字串執行區分文化特性的搜尋。Overloads of that search for a character perform an ordinal search, whereas those that search for a string perform a culture-sensitive search. > [!NOTE] > 如果可能的話，您應該呼叫字串比較方法具有一個型別的參數指定的預期的比較類型。When possible, you should call string comparison methods that have a parameter of type to specify the kind of comparison expected. 一般而言，用於比較使用者介面中顯示的字串 （使用目前文化特性） 的語言選項，並指定或安全性比較。As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify or for security comparisons. ## Examples 下列範例會判斷字元或字串的一部分內子字串的第一個和最後一個項目的索引。The following example determines the indexes of the first and last occurrences of a character or a substring within a portion of a string. 請注意，並要搜尋的字串，即使使用相同的不同部分`startIndex`參數。Note that and are searching in different portions of the string, even with the same `startIndex` parameter. span.span: In the following example, the method is used to find the soft hyphen (U+00AD) after an "n" in two strings.

span.span: Only one of the strings contains a soft hyphen.

para.span: 在這兩種情況下，因為選擇性連字號是可忽略的字元，區分文化特性的搜尋會傳回 1，表示它已找到相符項目位置的"n"。

span.span: In both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, a culture-sensitive search returns 1 to indicate that it has found a match at the position of the "n".

para.span: 序數搜尋，不過，成功於一個字串中找到選擇性連字號，並報告它不存在從第二個字串。

span.span: An ordinal search, however, successfully finds the soft hyphen in one string and reports that it is absent from the second string.

para.span: 在下列範例中，方法用來尋找選擇性連字號 (U + 00AD) 後面接著"m"從兩個字串中的第三個字元位置開始的位置。

span.span: In the following example, the method is used to find the position of a soft hyphen (U+00AD) followed by an "m" starting with the third character position in two strings.

span.span: In both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the method returns the index of "m" in the string when it performs a culture-sensitive comparison.

para.span: 請注意，就第一個字串的情況，這個字串是選擇性連字號後面接著 "m"，結果方法不是傳回選擇性連字號的索引，而是傳回 "m" 的索引。

span.span: Note that in the case of the first string, which includes the soft hyphen followed by an "m", the method fails to return the index of the soft hyphen but instead returns the index of the "m".

para.span: 只有在執行序數比較時，方法才會傳回第一個字串中選擇性連字號的索引。

span.span: The method returns the index of the soft hyphen in the first string only when it performs an ordinal comparison.

Unicode 值，表示為預先的字元，例如連音符號"Æ 」 (U + 00 C 6)，可能會被視為相等於任何出現在正確的順序，例如"AE"字元的元件 (u+0041，U + 0045)，這取決於文化特性。A Unicode value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of the character's components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. 若要執行序數 （不區分文化特性） 搜尋，其中比較的 Unicode 值，您應該呼叫其中一個參數類型多載並用值。To perform an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where the Unicode values are compared, you should call one of the overloads that has a parameter of type and use the value. > [!NOTE] > 如果可能的話，您應該呼叫字串比較方法具有一個型別的參數指定的預期的比較類型。When possible, you should call string comparison methods that have a parameter of type to specify the kind of comparison expected. 一般而言，用於比較使用者介面中顯示的字串 （使用目前文化特性） 的語言選項，並指定或安全性比較。As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify or for security comparisons. ## Examples 下列範例會判斷字元或字串的一部分內子字串的第一個和最後一個項目的索引。The following example determines the indexes of the first and last occurrences of a character or a substring within a portion of a string. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOfIntInt#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOfIntInt/CPP/indexofintint.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOfIntInt#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOfIntInt/CS/indexofintint.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOfIntInt#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOfIntInt/VB/indexofintint.vb#1)]

para.span: 字元集包含可忽略的字元，也就是執行語言或文化特性的排序時不會考慮的字元。

span.span: Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive sort.

para.span: 執行區分文化特性的搜尋時，如果 包含可忽略的字元，則結果等於在已移除該字元的情況下搜尋。

span.span: In a culture-sensitive search, if contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed.

para.span: 如果只包含一個或多個可忽略的字元，方法一律會傳回，這是搜尋開始處的字元位置。

span.span: If consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the method always returns , which is the character position at which the search begins.

para.span: 在下列範例中，方法用來尋找選擇性連字號 (U + 00AD) 後面接著"m"中的第三個透過兩個字串中的第六個字元位置開始的位置。

span.span: In the following example, the method is used to find the position of a soft hyphen (U+00AD) followed by an "m" starting in the third through sixth character positions in two strings.

para.span: 只有其中一個字串包含必要的子字串。

span.span: Only one of the strings contains the required substring.

para.span: 因為選擇性連字號是可忽略的字元，所以在這兩種情況下，方法執行區分文化特性的比較時都會傳回 "m" 在字串中的索引位置。

span.span: In both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the method returns the index of "m" in the string when it performs a culture-sensitive comparison.

para.span: 請注意，就第一個字串的情況，這個字串是選擇性連字號後面接著 "m"，結果方法不是傳回選擇性連字號的索引，而是傳回 "m" 的索引。

span.span: Note that in the case of the first string, which includes the soft hyphen followed by an "m", the method fails to return the index of the soft hyphen but instead returns the index of the "m".

span.span: Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive sort.

para.span: 在區分文化特性的搜尋中，如果是可忽略的字元，結果就相當於搜尋已移除該字元。

span.span: In a culture-sensitive search, if is an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed.

para.span: 在此情況下，方法一律會傳回，這是在搜尋一開始的字元位置。

span.span: In this case, the method always returns , which is the character position at which the search first began.

para.span: 在下列範例中，方法用來在兩個字串中，尋找"n"之後的選擇性連字號 (U + 00AD)。

span.span: In the following example, the method is used to find the soft hyphen (U+00AD) after an "n" in two strings.

para.span: 只有其中一個字串包含選擇性連字號。

span.span: Only one of the strings contains a soft hyphen.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 向後字串的結尾開始和結束時間字串的開頭搜尋的來源字串。The source string is searched backward starting at the end of the string and ending at the beginning of the string. 這個多載會執行區分文化特性的搜尋。This overload performs a culture-sensitive search. 如果字元是 Unicode 值，表示預先組成的字元，例如連音符號"Æ 」 (U + 00 C 6)，它可能要視為相當於正確的順序，例如"AE"及其元件的任何項目 (u+0041，U + 0045)，這取決於文化特性。If the character is a Unicode value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), it might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of its components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. 若要執行序數 （不區分文化特性） 搜尋，其中字元視為相當於另一個字元的 Unicode 值都相同時，才，您應該呼叫其中一個參數類型多載並用值。To perform an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where a character is considered equivalent to another character only if the Unicode values are the same, you should call one of the overloads that has a parameter of type and use the value. 多載字元該搜尋會執行序數搜尋，而其會搜尋字串執行區分文化特性的搜尋。Overloads of that search for a character perform an ordinal search, whereas those that search for a string perform a culture-sensitive search. > [!NOTE] > 如果可能的話，您應該呼叫字串比較方法具有一個型別的參數指定的預期的比較類型。When possible, you should call string comparison methods that have a parameter of type to specify the kind of comparison expected. 一般而言，用於比較使用者介面中顯示的字串 （使用目前文化特性） 的語言選項，並指定或安全性比較。As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify or for security comparisons. ## Examples 下列範例會判斷字元或字串內子字串的第一個和最後一個項目的索引。The following example determines the indexes of the first and last occurrences of a character or a substring within a string. remarks.format: ## Remarks 向後字串的結尾開始和結束時間字串的開頭搜尋的來源字串。The source string is searched backward starting at the end of the string and ending at the beginning of the string. 值無效，此方法。The value is not valid for this method. 如果`options`不包含值，這個多載會執行區分文化特性的搜尋。If `options` does not include the value, this overload performs a culture-sensitive search. 如果字元是 Unicode 值，表示預先組成的字元，例如連音符號"Æ 」 (U + 00 C 6)，它可能要視為相當於正確的順序，例如"AE"及其元件的任何項目 (u+0041，U + 0045)，這取決於文化特性。If the character is a Unicode value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), it might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of its components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. 如果`options`包含值，這個多載執行序數 （不區分文化特性） 搜尋。If `options` includes the value, this overload performs an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search. 字元會被視為相等於另一個字元的 Unicode 值都相同時，才。A character is considered equivalent to another character only if the Unicode values are the same. 多載字元該搜尋會執行序數搜尋，而其會搜尋字串執行區分文化特性的搜尋。Overloads of that search for a character perform an ordinal search, whereas those that search for a string perform a culture-sensitive search. > [!NOTE] > 如果可能的話，您應該呼叫字串比較方法具有一個型別的參數指定的預期的比較類型。When possible, you should call string comparison methods that have a parameter of type to specify the kind of comparison expected. 一般而言，用於比較使用者介面中顯示的字串 （使用目前文化特性） 的語言選項，並指定或安全性比較。As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify or for security comparisons. ## Examples 下列範例會判斷字元或字串內子字串的第一個和最後一個項目的索引。The following example determines the indexes of the first and last occurrences of a character or a substring within a string. remarks.format: ## Remarks 來源字串不會搜尋回溯開始`startIndex`和結束時間字串的開頭。The source string is searched backward starting at `startIndex` and ending at the beginning of the string. 這個多載會執行區分文化特性的搜尋。This overload performs a culture-sensitive search. Unicode 值，表示為預先的字元，例如連音符號"Æ 」 (U + 00 C 6)，可能會被視為相等於任何出現在正確的順序，例如"AE"字元的元件 (u+0041，U + 0045)，這取決於文化特性。A Unicode value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of the character's components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. 若要執行序數 （不區分文化特性） 搜尋，其中比較的 Unicode 值，您應該呼叫其中一個參數類型多載並用值。To perform an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where the Unicode values are compared, you should call one of the overloads that has a parameter of type and use the value. > [!NOTE] > 如果可能的話，您應該呼叫字串比較方法具有一個型別的參數指定的預期的比較類型。When possible, you should call string comparison methods that have a parameter of type to specify the kind of comparison expected. 一般而言，用於比較使用者介面中顯示的字串 （使用目前文化特性） 的語言選項，並指定或安全性比較。As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify or for security comparisons. ## Examples 下列範例會判斷字元或字串的一部分內子字串的第一個和最後一個項目的索引。The following example determines the indexes of the first and last occurrences of a character or a substring within a portion of a string. 請注意，並要搜尋的字串，即使使用相同的不同部分`startIndex`參數。Note that and are searching in different portions of the string, even with the same `startIndex` parameter. span.span: If consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the method always returns , which is the character position at which the search begins.

para.span: 在下列範例中，方法用來尋找子字串，其中包含選擇性連字號 (U + 00AD)，以及之前或在字串中加入的最後一個的"m"。

span.span: In the following example, the method is used to find a substring that includes a soft hyphen (U+00AD) and that precedes or includes the final "m" in a string.

para.span: 搜尋字串中的選擇性連字號會被忽略，因為呼叫方法以尋找子字串，包含選擇性連字號和"m"會傳回在字串中，"m"的位置而呼叫它來尋找子字串，包含選擇性連字號和"n"會傳回 "n"名的位置。

span.span: Because the soft hyphen in the search string is ignored, calling the method to find a substring that consists of the soft hyphen and "m" returns the position of the "m" in the string, whereas calling it to find a substring that consists of the soft hyphen and "n" returns the position of the "n".

para.span: 當搜尋字串不包含只選擇性連字號時，方法會傳回"m"，其代表的值索引。

span.span: When the search string contains only the soft hyphen, the method returns the index of the "m", which represents the value of .

Unicode 值，表示為預先的字元，例如連音符號"Æ 」 (U + 00 C 6)，可能會被視為相等於任何出現在正確的順序，例如"AE"字元的元件 (u+0041，U + 0045)，這取決於文化特性。A Unicode value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of the character's components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. 如果`options`包含值，這個多載會執行序數 （不區分文化特性） 搜尋，其中比較的 Unicode 值。If `options` includes the value, this overload performs an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where the Unicode values are compared. > [!NOTE] > 如果可能的話，您應該呼叫字串比較方法具有一個型別的參數指定的預期的比較類型。When possible, you should call string comparison methods that have a parameter of type to specify the kind of comparison expected. 一般而言，用於比較使用者介面中顯示的字串 （使用目前文化特性） 的語言選項，並指定或安全性比較。As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify or for security comparisons. ## Examples 下列範例會判斷字元或字串的一部分內子字串的第一個和最後一個項目的索引。The following example determines the indexes of the first and last occurrences of a character or a substring within a portion of a string. 請注意，並要搜尋的字串，即使使用相同的不同部分`startIndex`參數。Note that and are searching in different portions of the string, even with the same `startIndex` parameter. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOfInt#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOfInt/CPP/indexofint.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOfInt#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOfInt/CS/indexofint.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOfInt#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOfInt/VB/indexofint.vb#1)]

contains an invalid value.

para.span: 字元集包含可忽略的字元，也就是執行語言或文化特性的排序時不會考慮的字元。

span.span: Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive sort.

para.span: 執行區分文化特性的搜尋 (也就是說，如果 不是 或 ) 時，如果 包含可忽略的字元，則結果等於在已移除該字元的情況下搜尋。

span.span: In a culture-sensitive search (that is, if is not or ), if contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed.

para.span: 如果只包含一個或多個可忽略的字元，方法一律會傳回，這是搜尋開始處的字元位置。

span.span: If consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the method always returns , which is the character position at which the search begins.

para.span: 在下列範例中，方法用來尋找後面接著"m"，開頭為兩個字串中的"m"最後一個選擇性連字號 (U + 00AD) 的位置。

span.span: In the following example, the method is used to find the position of a soft hyphen (U+00AD) followed by an "m", starting with the final "m" in two strings.

para.span: 只有其中一個字串包含必要的子字串。

span.span: Only one of the strings contains the required substring.

para.span: 因為選擇性連字號是可忽略的字元，所以在這兩種情況下，方法執行區分文化特性的比較時都會傳回 "m" 在字串中的索引位置。

span.span: In both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the method returns the index of "m" in the string when it performs a culture-sensitive comparison.

para.span: 請注意，就第一個字串的情況，這個字串是選擇性連字號後面接著 "m"，結果方法不是傳回選擇性連字號的索引，而是傳回 "m" 的索引。

span.span: Note that in the case of the first string, which includes the soft hyphen followed by an "m", the method fails to return the index of the soft hyphen but instead returns the index of the "m".

para.span: 只有在執行序數比較時，方法才會傳回第一個字串中選擇性連字號的索引。

span.span: The method returns the index of the soft hyphen in the first string only when it performs an ordinal comparison.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 來源字串不會搜尋回溯起價`startIndex`結尾`startIndex` - `count` + 1。The source string is searched backward starting at `startIndex` and ending at `startIndex` - `count` + 1. 值無效，此方法。The value is not valid for this method. 如果`options`不包含值，這個多載會執行區分文化特性的搜尋。If `options` does not include the value, this overload performs a culture-sensitive search. Unicode 值，表示為預先的字元，例如連音符號"Æ 」 (U + 00 C 6)，可能會被視為相等於任何出現在正確的順序，例如"AE"字元的元件 (u+0041，U + 0045)，這取決於文化特性。A Unicode value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of the character's components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. 如果`options`包含值，這個多載會執行序數 （不區分文化特性） 搜尋，其中比較的 Unicode 值。If `options` includes the value, this overload performs an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where the Unicode values are compared. > [!NOTE] > 如果可能的話，您應該呼叫字串比較方法具有一個型別的參數指定的預期的比較類型。When possible, you should call string comparison methods that have a parameter of type to specify the kind of comparison expected. 一般而言，用於比較使用者介面中顯示的字串 （使用目前文化特性） 的語言選項，並指定或安全性比較。As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify or for security comparisons. ## Examples 下列範例會判斷字元或字串的一部分內子字串的第一個和最後一個項目的索引。The following example determines the indexes of the first and last occurrences of a character or a substring within a portion of a string. para.span: 字元集包含可忽略的字元，也就是執行語言或文化特性的排序時不會考慮的字元。

span.span: Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive sort.

para.span: 執行區分文化特性的搜尋 (也就是說，如果 不是 或 ) 時，如果 包含可忽略的字元，則結果等於在已移除該字元的情況下搜尋。

span.span: In a culture-sensitive search (that is, if is not or ), if contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed.

para.span: 如果只包含一個或多個可忽略的字元，方法一律會傳回，這是搜尋開始處的字元位置。

span.span: If consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the method always returns , which is the character position at which the search begins.

para.span: 在下列範例中，方法用來在兩個字串中尋找的選擇性連字號 (U + 00AD) 後面接著"m"中所有的位置，但第一個字元位置之前的最終"m"。

span.span: In the following example, the method is used to find the position of a soft hyphen (U+00AD) followed by an "m" in all but the first character position before the final "m" in two strings.

para.span: 只有其中一個字串包含必要的子字串。

span.span: Only one of the strings contains the required substring.

para.span: 因為選擇性連字號是可忽略的字元，所以在這兩種情況下，方法執行區分文化特性的比較時都會傳回 "m" 在字串中的索引位置。

span.span: In both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the method returns the index of "m" in the string when it performs a culture-sensitive comparison.

para.span: 當它執行序數比較時，不過，它會尋找子字串只在第一個字串中。

span.span: When it performs an ordinal comparison, however, it finds the substring only in the first string.

para.span: 請注意，第一個字串，其中包含選擇性的連字號後面接著"m"，如果方法無法傳回選擇性連字號的索引，但改為傳回"m"的索引，當它執行區分文化特性的比較。

span.span: Note that in the case of the first string, which includes the soft hyphen followed by an "m", the method fails to return the index of the soft hyphen but instead returns the index of the "m" when it performs a culture-sensitive comparison.

para.span: 只有在執行序數比較時，方法才會傳回第一個字串中選擇性連字號的索引。

span.span: The method returns the index of the soft hyphen in the first string only when it performs an ordinal comparison.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和屬性可以有不同的值。The and properties can have different values. 比方說，十六進位 0x10407 屬性值會識別可能會出現在德文電話簿排序名稱的替代排序文化特性。For example, an property value of hexadecimal 0x10407 identifies an alternate sort culture that sorts names as they might appear in a German telephone book. 屬性具有值為"de-de_phoneb"，而相關聯的德文 （德國） 文化特性屬性的值為"DE-DE"。The property has a value of "de-de_phoneb", whereas the property of the associated German (Germany) culture has a value of "de-DE". ## Examples 下列範例會比較使用 FR-FR 和 JA-JP 文化特性的三個字串。The following example compares three strings using the fr-FR and ja-JP cultures. 屬性用來顯示每個文化特性的名稱。The property is used to display the name of each culture. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會覆寫方法。This method overrides the method. 它會傳回類別名稱和執行個體的值所組成的字串屬性，以連字號分隔。It returns a string that consists of the class name and the value of the instance property, separated by a hyphen.

para.span: .NET Framework 4 中，繼續方法會傳回類別名稱，後面接著一個空格、 連字號、 空格和值屬性。

span.span: Staring with the .NET Framework 4, the method returns the class name followed by a space, a hyphen, a space, and the value of the property.

para.span: 例如，對於物件，表示是 EN-US 文化特性，方法會傳回"Compareinfo&lt-EN-US"。

span.span: For example, for a object that represents the en-US culture, the method returns "CompareInfo - en-US".

para.span: 在舊版.NET Framework 中，它會傳回類別名稱，後面接著一個空格、 連字號、 空格和值屬性。

span.span: In previous versions of the .NET Framework, it returns the class name followed by a space, a hyphen, a space, and the value of the property.

para.span: 例如，對於物件，表示是 EN-US 文化特性，方法會傳回"Compareinfo&lt-1033年"。

span.span: For example, for a object that represents the en-US culture, the method returns "CompareInfo - 1033".

summary.span: 取得用於比較和排序字串的 Unicode 版本的相關資訊。

span.span: Gets information about the version of Unicode used for comparing and sorting strings.

value.span: 包含用於比較和排序字串之 Unicode 版本相關資訊的物件。

span.span: An object that contains information about the Unicode version used for comparing and sorting strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 個別字元，加權，因此特定字串的比較或排序的方式取決於特定版本的.NET Framework 實作的 Unicode 規格版本。The weight of individual characters, and therefore the way in which particular strings are compared or ordered, depends on the version of the Unicode specification that a particular version of the .NET Framework implements. 在 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，這也取決於主機作業系統中，如下表所示。In the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], this also depends on the host operating system, as the following table shows. 請注意，這份支援的 Unicode 版本清單僅適用於字元比較和排序，並不適用於依類別來分類 Unicode 字元。Note that this list of supported Unicode versions applies to character comparison and sorting only; it does not apply to classification of Unicode characters by category. |.NET Framework 版本.NET Framework version|作業系統Operating system|Unicode 版本Unicode version| |----------------------------|----------------------|---------------------| |[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]|所有作業系統All operating systems|Unicode 5.0Unicode 5.0| |[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 和更新版本and later versions|[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]|Unicode 5.0Unicode 5.0| |[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 和更新版本and later versions|[!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)] 和更新版本的 Windows 作業系統版本and later Windows operating system versions|Unicode 6.3Unicode 6.3| 所傳回的物件屬性不會識別用來比較字串的精確 Unicode 版本。The object returned by the property doesn't identify the precise Unicode version used to compare strings. 比較兩個時，才會有用來判斷是否它們使用相同的 Unicode 版本和文化特性來比較字串的物件。It is useful only when comparing two objects to determine whether they use the same Unicode version and culture to compare strings. 如需詳細資訊和範例，請參閱參考頁面。For more information and an example, see the reference page.
